awd_titl_txt: Eighth Meeting of the Division of Particles and Fields of   the American Physical Society; August 2-6, 1994
awd_abstract_narration: 9318871  Seidel   This grant provides partial support for the meeting of the Division of Particle Physics of the American Physical Society.  This is the most widely attended conference of active researchers and most encompassing in subject matter.  The grant will enable participation of graduate students to report on their work and attend sessions of interest to learn in detail of the most recent results in particle.  It provides them an important opportunity to interact with scientists at all levels of experience. fillin "Enter Proposal Number: "    fillin "Enter PI LastName: " ***            MAIN     O             7)  w  !
